descriptions.app_description: Monitors CDN response times and geo-specific latency issues using the Cloudflare GraphQL Analytics API.

data.author: Jay Udoye
key_features: Uses Cloudflare GraphQL Analytics API to check for CDN response time
Helps user to keep Latency in Check

settings.label: Cloudflare API Key
settings.description: API token Key for authenticating with the Cloudflare GraphQL Analytics API.

settings.label: Cloudflare Zone ID
settings.description: Cloudflare Zone ID for accessing the analytics data.

settings.label: Telex Webhook URL
settings.description: Telex webhook URL for sending latency alerts.
